/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, divided by a median, stretches out into the distance, flanked by buildings and trees on both sides. The buildings, predominantly white and gray, rise up to meet the clear blue sky, punctuated by fluffy white clouds. The trees, a mix of green and brown, add a touch of nature to the urban landscape. Streetlights stand sentinel along the road, ready to illuminate the area as dusk falls. The image is bathed in the warm glow of a sunny day, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings. Despite the absence of people in the frame, the image conveys a sense of life and activity, characteristic of a busy city street.
